name: Application Developer (Big Data)
description:
STRABAG SE - Europe's leading technology group in the construction industry, builds projects all over the world by combining people, equipment and construction technology in the right place at the right time. Without teamwork - especially considering the geography of construction - this would not be possible. Become part of our international team!

Key Tasks:

- Support the Data Architecture & Engineer as a classic application developer.

- Development of smaller applications, components, procedures, functions and APIs that Data Engineers, ML Engineers, Data Scientists and Developers use in their projects.

- Support the Data Engineers in the development of database projects

Requirements:

- Good experience as an Application Developer, preferably in the Microsoft (Azure) environment

- Experience in the development of Web-FrontEnds

- Good knowledge in SQL, API development and scripting languages (e.g. Python)

- Ideally know-how in development on the Microsoft Power Platform

- Experience with version control, test automation, build systems, deployment and CI / CD pipelines, preferably with Azure DevOps

- Analytical thinking skills and structured way of working

Will be a plus:

  • Fluent in spoken and written German or English
  • Experience with Microsoft products

We offer:

  • Work with advanced technologies with the opportunity to develop as an expert in the field of Big Data
  • Working in a young team of professionals
  • Extended medical insurance, extended period of paid vacation
  • The final salary level depends on professional knowledge and is discussed with the successful candidate

If you are interested in the proposed vacancy and are ready to take part in the competition, we will be happy to meet you!

Human resource development department
